original_text: And it came to pass, as soon as he had made an end of speaking, that, behold, the king's sons came, and lifted up their voice and wept: and the king also and all his servants wept very sore.
korean_text: 말을 마치자 왕자들이 이르러 소리를 높여 통곡하니 왕과 그의 모든 신하들도 심히 통곡하니라

sentences.original_text: as soon as he had made an end of speaking
and lifted up their voice and wept
and the king also and all his servants wept very sore
sentences.korean_translation: 왕도 또한 그의 모든 종들이 매우 격렬하게 울었다
